resources.string:
• Write the below lines on 3 white sheets of paper separately
 • "Time is ticking. It does not stop for anyone"
 • "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift."
 • "That is why it is called the present."
 • Click a picture of all the three writings and upload it as three separate images!
\u2022 Writing with a black pen\n \u2022 Writing that is captured so that text is centered in the image
\u2022 Supported formats: png, jpg, jpeg and pdf
A personality analysis by the Graphology Tool!
This app needs permission to use this feature. You can grant them in app settings.
